title: 谨贺新年
content:
[[include :scp-jp:component:jstyles]]

[[module css]]
@import url(http://scp-jp-sandbox3.wikidot.com/draft:3282741-93-bd45/code/1);
@import url('https://fonts.googleapis.com/css2?family=Noto+Serif+SC:wght@600&display=swap');

.nengajyo {
font-family: 'Noto Serif SC', 'Libre Baskerville', 'Sawarabi Mincho', serif;
font-size: large;
border: thick solid #d00;
padding: 20px;
text-align: center;
}

div#header h1 a::before {
    content: "谨贺新年";
    font-family: 'Noto Serif SC', 'Libre Baskerville', 'Sawarabi Mincho', serif;
}

div#header h2::after {
    content: "SCP基金会日语分部";
    font-family: 'Noto Serif SC', 'Libre Baskerville', 'Sawarabi Mincho', serif;
}
[[/module]]

[[include :scp-wiki-cn:credit:start-standalone]]
**标题:** 謹賀新年
**著者:** ©︎[[*user hitsujikaip]]
**作成年:** 2021
[[include :scp-wiki-cn:credit:end-standalone]]

[[div class="nengajyo"]]

[[div class="vpoem"]]
谨贺新年
[[/div]]

------

新年快乐

今岁也请多关照

──令和叁年元旦　[[*user hitsujikaip]]

[[/div]]
